amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to pursue any extra-legal ways to transfer Federal lands to private owners in contravention of existing law.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 76 printed in House Report 115-297 to prohibit the use of funds to pursue any extra-legal ways to transfer Federal lands to private owners in contravention of existing law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A099) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 212 (Roll no. 491).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A099) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 212 (Roll no. 491).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A099) offered by Mr. Polis.
